languages.text: {n}Массивное тело приходит в движение. Поднявшись и недобро сверкнув на вас алыми визорами, Глейто тут же принюхивается и уверенно бежит куда-то в сторону.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Пес по стопу встает, бежит и останавливается у первой точки
Пес по стопу встает, бежит и останавливается у первой точки

languages.text: {n}The hulking body stirs into motion. Glaito rises to his feet and glares at you through his scarlet visors, then immediately sniffs and decisively runs somewhere off to the side.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Массивное тело приходит в движение. Поднявшись и недобро сверкнув на вас алыми визорами, Глейто тут же принюхивается и уверенно бежит куда-то в сторону.{/n}

{n}The hulking body stirs into motion. Glaito rises to his feet and glares at you through his scarlet visors, then immediately sniffs and decisively runs somewhere off to the side.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ごつごつした体が動き始めた。グライトは立ち上がり、赤いバイザー越しにあなたを睨みつけると、すぐに鼻を鳴らし、意志を持って横へ走り出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking body stirs into motion. Glaito rises to his feet and glares at you through his scarlet visors, then immediately sniffs and decisively runs somewhere off to the side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ごつごつした体が動き始めた。グライトは立ち上がり、赤いバイザー越しにあなたを睨みつけると、すぐに鼻を鳴らし、意志を持って横へ走り出した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der massige Körper bewegt sich. Glaito steht auf, starrt dich durch seine violetten Visoren an, schnüffelt und rennt entschlossen zur Seite los.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking body stirs into motion. Glaito rises to his feet and glares at you through his scarlet visors, then immediately sniffs and decisively runs somewhere off to the side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der massige Körper bewegt sich. Glaito steht auf, starrt dich durch seine violetten Visoren an, schnüffelt und rennt entschlossen zur Seite los.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La créature massive s'anime. Glaito se relève et vous observe à travers ses visières écarlates. Il renifle l'air et s'éloigne de vous en courant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking body stirs into motion. Glaito rises to his feet and glares at you through his scarlet visors, then immediately sniffs and decisively runs somewhere off to the side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature massive s'anime. Glaito se relève et vous observe à travers ses visières écarlates. Il renifle l'air et s'éloigne de vous en courant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El enorme corpachón se agita y empieza a moverse. Glaito se pone en pie y te observa con sus visores escarlata, luego olfatea el aire inmediatamente y sale disparado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking body stirs into motion. Glaito rises to his feet and glares at you through his scarlet visors, then immediately sniffs and decisively runs somewhere off to the side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El enorme corpachón se agita y empieza a moverse. Glaito se pone en pie y te observa con sus visores escarlata, luego olfatea el aire inmediatamente y sale disparado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托硕大的身躯动了起来。它站起身，目光透过猩红色的面甲盯着你，随后立刻嗅了嗅，果断地跑向了附近的某个地方。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking body stirs into motion. Glaito rises to his feet and glares at you through his scarlet visors, then immediately sniffs and decisively runs somewhere off to the side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托硕大的身躯动了起来。它站起身，目光透过猩红色的面甲盯着你，随后立刻嗅了嗅，果断地跑向了附近的某个地方。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mastifin iri bedeni bir anda harekete geçiyor. Glaito, ayağa kalkıp kırmızı vizörleriyle sana bakıyor ve ardından hemen aldığı bir kokunun peşinden koşturmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking body stirs into motion. Glaito rises to his feet and glares at you through his scarlet visors, then immediately sniffs and decisively runs somewhere off to the side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mastifin iri bedeni birden harekete geçer. Glaito ayağa kalkıp kırmızı vizörüyle sana bakar ve sonra da hemen aldığı kokunun yönünde kararlı bir şekilde koşmaya başlar.{/n}
